description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Petroleum ... Together with the occurrence and uses of natural gas. Edited chiefly from the German of Prof. Hans Hoefer and Dr. Alexander Veith, by W. T. Brannt ... Illustrated, etc. (Based upon “Das Erdoel und seine Verwandten,” von Prof. H. Hoefer, and “Das Erdoel und seine Verarbeitung,” von Dr. A. Veith.)" Author: BRANNT, William Theodore. Contributor: HOEFER, Hanns. Contributor: VEITH, Alexander. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 7105.dd.2." Page: 271 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1895 Publisher: H. C. Baird & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000455625 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
